text: Devit Gotɨndu tavɨyɨ indɨhuta, mavatɨmba amutɨ ndu tak Gotɨndu tamɨŋgaŋgɨmbañɨ kɨyɨhi, Gotɨŋ kɨrañɨŋguhu haŋɨnɨŋ tamahu mambɨrañɨ kɨndi. Kandɨhaŋandɨhin mɨŋata nuŋandɨ hati naŋga ñamu. Mavatɨmba kandɨha kru saŋɨŋɨnɨŋ mañarasɨmu, Gotɨŋ kɨrañɨŋguhu haŋɨnɨŋ ndaya ñarasɨmu. Hara Devit naŋga nuŋandɨ hati ñamu.
